name: FV-300L (original)
details:
FV-300L Stereo Volume Pedal (orignal version)Low-impedence stereo volume pedal with heavy-duty all-metal design
Special 2-in/2-out design enables direct control of stereo keyboards and stereo effects units
Minimum Volume knob lets users set the minimum volume as desired
Convenient Tuner Out jack enables speedy tuning on stage
Combined with the optional PCS-33 Stereo Phone Cable, the FV-300L can also be used as an expression pedal
https://www.boss.info/us/products/fv-300l/features/
